name: "SmoothBond Hardboard"
description: Hardboard has a high internal bond, exceptional stability, and smoothness ideal for paneling, furniture, fixtures, toys, general manufacturing, and applications where painting or die cutting is required. Hardboard is used in a variety of applications including furniture components, wall paneling, underlayment, interior trim and perforated boards. It resists marring, scuffing and abrasion, as well as changes in temperature and humidity.California residents: see Proposition 65 informationHardboard can be used in many applicationsThe hardboard surface is smooth and free of common wood defectsHardboard has a uniform thickness, density and appearance and has no grainHardboard can be securely glued or fastened with screws, staples or nailsNote: Product may vary by store
